The Rangers of Lot Ch. 5
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: The Rangers of Lot Ch. 5
By Sturnum94 on Monday, August 14, 2006 - 06:41 pm:

The 3 rangers were running from the the green mist. Everything in it's path would die of poisoning. Zagref was still thinking, "how could I have been fooled?" Behind them, Mahjor's minions were chasing them.

"Zagref, we have to get to IMa territory. That is the only area that hasn't been populated by Mahjor!" Soluv said. The Rangers were reaching IMa, which turned from a peaceful raising country, to a secret battle base against Mahjor. They reached the Gates into the country. There, they were greeted by Songi, a very powerful Golem/General. "Zagref, good to see you again. Ever since the Devil Gene was discovered and destroyed a century ago, things slowed down. But now, we must destroy Mahjor. Our scientists say that Mahjor is the most powerful monster with the devil gene. He is the devil himself. I'm afraid that my army isn't going to be strong enough to finish him off. Last time, we got lucky."

Solon looked around. He saw others preparing for the iminant threat of Mahjor. "Mahjor isn't going to win. He can't, and we won't allow it. Your men can take out the ones already manipulated. The strongest ones will work with us to take out the Great Betrayer, or should I say, Hijora, our fallen friend. As well as the devil himself, Mahjor." Zagref, with defiance, said to the others.

The hours passed, every minute, filled the Warriors woth fear. Everyone tried to sleep, waiting for hell in the morning. Zagref actually slept. He, again dreamed with Lot.

"Zagref, you have come far. You will fight a very bloody battle. Most will die, I cannot tell you who is going to come out victor. But I will help you. Mahjor will destry very much of the area. He will get desparate. He will try everything he can. Eventually, I will come from out of the ground, and I will battle Mahjor. You, and only you must battle the Betrayer. the others must fight the manipulated ones. Only you can defeat the Betrayer. Goodbye, Zagref. Goodbye........"

Zagref awoke. He told the General about it, as well as the Rangers. "We must prepare for him. If Lot is coming, Mahjor should be the last one. Lot will finish the Devil Gene for good. Lot is the most powerful being, right?" Songi said. Then, the horns blew, which meant that Mahjor was close. "Everyone, BATTLE STATIONS!!! Get in your groups! Remain in your flanks! Prepare for HELL!!!!" The General Shouted in the mike. Everyone got in their positions. Then, like the General said, all HELL broke loose. The warriors were actually defeating Mahjor's minions. Mahjor stood above, watching. Monster blood was flying everywhere. there was death taking place.

Zagref met with Hijora. "Hello, leader." Hijora said, mockingly. "Hijora, prepare to die. I will kill you for betraying me. Mahjor can't protect you now." Zagref said. Hijora laughed. "You can't defeat me, even without Mahjor's help. You don't have the power to even scratch me. Zagref shouted, and launched Vulcan fire at Hijora. He dodged it easily, and sent it back 10-fold. Zagref used a Vulcan shield, which deflcted the fire. Hijora used a dimension portal. Their conflict lasted for a while. Eventually, they both got tired. "You still can't defeat me, Zagref!" Hijora said. "Ha! The mighty Hijora, looks tired. You can't defeat me, not without Mahjor. Your weak." Zagref said.

Then, everything got silent. The ground was coming apart. Suddenly, a very shiny monster arose. Once everyone got adjusted to the light, they saw who it was. It was a Durahan. Shiny gold armor, Shiny silver blade, a helmet the shape of a Gali, and a shiny blue shield. It was LOT!

"Mahjor, you have been terrorizing my land for years. Now you must die." Lot came to Mahjor. He clashed blades with Mahjor. Mahjor's Sythe, vs. Lot's Silver Sword. This battle was the biigest clash of the century.

To be continued.......
